verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) The Lord <WH3068> is my light <WH216> and my salvation; <WH3468> Whom <WH4310> shall I fear <WH3372>? The Lord <WH3068> is the defense <WH4581> of my life; <WH9132> Whom <WH4310> shall I dread <WH6342>?
When evildoers <WH7489> came <WH7126> upon me to devour <WH398> my flesh, <WH1320> My adversaries <WH6862> and my enemies, <WH340> they stumbled <WH3782> and fell. <WH5307>

Though <WH518> a host <WH4264> encamp <WH2583> against <WH5921> me, My heart <WH3820> will not fear; <WH3372> Though <WH518> war <WH4421> arise <WH6965> against <WH5921> me, In [spite of] this <WH384> I shall be confident. <WH982>

One <WH259> thing <WH259> I have asked <WH7592> from the Lord, <WH3068> that I shall seek: <WH1245> That I may dwell <WH3427> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of my life, <WH9132> To behold <WH2372> the beauty <WH5278> of the Lord, <WH3068> And to meditate <WH1239> in His temple. <WH1964>

For in the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH9567> He will conceal <WH6845> me in His tabernacle; <WH5520> In the secret <WH5643> place <WH5643> of His tent <WH168> He will hide <WH5641> me; He will lift <WH7311> me up on a rock. <WH6697>

And now <WH6258> my head <WH7218> will be lifted <WH7311> up above <WH5921> my enemies <WH340> around <WH5439> me; And I will offer <WH2076> in His tent <WH168> sacrifices <WH2077> with shouts <WH8643> of joy; <WH8643> I will sing, <WH7891> yes, I will sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to the Lord. <WH3068>
Hear, <WH8085> O Lord, <WH3068> when I cry <WH7121> with my voice, <WH6963> And be gracious <WH2603> to me and answer <WH6030> me.
[When Thou didst say,] "Seek <WH1245> My face, <WH6440>" my heart <WH3820> said <WH559> to Thee, "Thy face, <WH6440> O Lord, <WH3068> I shall seek. <WH1245>"

Do not hide <WH5641> Thy face <WH6440> from me, Do not turn <WH5186> Thy servant <WH5650> away <WH5186> in anger; <WH639> Thou hast been <WH1961> my help; <WH5833> Do not abandon <WH5203> me nor <WH408> forsake <WH5800> me, O God <WH430> of my salvation! <WH3468>
For my father and my mother <WH1> have forsaken <WH517> me, But the Lord <WH5800> will take <WH3068> me up.
Teach <WH3384> me Thy way, <WH1870> O Lord, <WH3068> And lead <WH5148> me in a level <WH4334> path, <WH734> Because <WH4616> of my foes. <WH9596>

Do not deliver <WH5414> me over to the desire <WH5315> of my adversaries; <WH6862> For false <WH8267> witnesses <WH5707> have risen <WH6965> against me, And such as breathe <WH3307> out violence. <WH2555>
[I would have despaired] unless <WH3884> I had believed <WH539> that I would see <WH7200> the goodness <WH2898> of the Lord <WH3068> In the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
Wait <WH6960> for the Lord; <WH3068> Be strong, <WH2388> and let your heart <WH3820> take <WH553> courage; <WH553> Yes, wait <WH6960> for the Lord. <WH3068>
